title: Iran changes its mind, says it will allow U.S. wrestlers after judge blocks Trump travel ban
text: But Bahram Ghasemi, a spokesman for Iran's foreign ministry, said Sunday that the American team would be granted visas in part because of the decision by a U.S. federal judge to "halt the execution of discriminatory restrictions against the entrance of Iranian citizens to America," the official Islamic Republic News Agency reported.
summary: But Bahram Ghasemi, a spokesman for Iran's foreign ministry, said Sunday that the American team would be granted visas in part because of the decision by a U.S. federal judge to "halt the execution of discriminatory restrictions against the entrance of Iranian citizens to America," the official Islamic Republic News Agency reported.
